verses.verse: תְּהִלָּ֗ה <S%H8416><s%> [Psalm] of praise לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> David's אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <S%H7311><s%> I will extol אֱלוֹהַ֣י <S%H433><s%> God הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king וַאֲבָרֲכָ֥ה <S%H1288><s%> and I will bless שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Every day אֲבָרֲכֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1288><s%> will I bless וַאֲהַלְלָ֥ה <S%H1984><s%> thee and I will praise שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> Great יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and greatly וְ֝לִגְדֻלָּת֗וֹ <S%H1420><s%> and his greatness אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else חֵֽקֶר׃ <S%H2714><s%> [is] unsearchable

דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> One לְ֭דוֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation יְשַׁבַּ֣ח <S%H7623><s%> shall praise מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> thy works וּגְב֖וּרֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H1369><s%> thy mighty acts יַגִּֽידוּ׃ <S%H5046><s%> to another and shall declare

הֲ֭דַר <S%H1926><s%> honour כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of the glorious הוֹדֶ֑ךָ <S%H1935><s%> of thy majesty וְדִבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> works נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H6381><s%> and of thy wondrous אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <S%H7878><s%> I will speak

וֶעֱז֣וּז <S%H5807><s%> of the might נוֹרְאֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H3372><s%> of thy terrible acts יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <S%H559><s%> And [men] shall speak [וּגְדוּלֹּתֶיךָ כ] (וּגְדוּלָּתְךָ֥ <S%H1420><s%> dignity ק) אֲסַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5608><s%> and I will declare

זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> the memory רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> of thy great טוּבְךָ֣ <S%H2898><s%> goodness יַבִּ֑יעוּ <S%H5042><s%> They shall abundantly utter וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> of thy righteousness יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> and shall sing

חַנּ֣וּן <S%H2587><s%> [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> and full of compassion יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <S%H639><s%> to anger וּגְדָל־ <S%H1419><s%> and of great חָֽסֶד׃ <S%H2617><s%> mercy

טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> to all וְ֝רַחֲמָ֗יו <S%H7356><s%> to all and his tender mercies עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <S%H4639><s%> [are] over all his works

יוֹד֣וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> shall praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> All thy works וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <S%H2623><s%> and thy saints יְבָרֲכֽוּכָה׃ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless
כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of the glory מַלְכוּתְךָ֣ <S%H4438><s%> of thy kingdom יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <S%H559><s%> They shall speak וּגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <S%H1369><s%> of thy power יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> and talk

לְהוֹדִ֤יעַ ׀ <S%H3045><s%> To make known לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the sons הָ֭אָדָם <S%H120><s%> of men גְּבוּרֹתָ֑יו <S%H1369><s%> his mighty acts וּ֝כְב֗וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glorious הֲדַ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> majesty מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> of his kingdom

מַֽלְכוּתְךָ֗ <S%H4438><s%> Thy kingdom מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> kingdom כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹֽלָמִ֑ים <S%H5769><s%> [is] an everlasting וּ֝מֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֗ <S%H4475><s%> and thy dominion בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [endureth] throughout all וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

סוֹמֵ֣ךְ <S%H5564><s%> upholdeth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנֹּפְלִ֑ים <S%H5307><s%> all that fall וְ֝זוֹקֵ֗ף <S%H2210><s%> and raiseth up לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכְּפוּפִֽים׃ <S%H3721><s%> all [those that be] bowed down

עֵֽינֵי־ <S%H5869><s%> The eyes כֹ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H7663><s%> of all wait וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> and You נֽוֹתֵן־ <S%H5414><s%> upon thee and thou givest לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָכְלָ֣ם <S%H400><s%> them their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6256><s%> in due season

פּוֹתֵ֥חַ <S%H6605><s%> Thou openest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וּמַשְׂבִּ֖יעַ <S%H7646><s%> and satisfiest לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every חַ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of every living thing רָצֽוֹן׃ <S%H7522><s%> the desire

צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> [is] righteous יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכָ֑יו <S%H1870><s%> in all his ways וְ֝חָסִ֗יד <S%H2623><s%> and holy בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <S%H4639><s%> in all his works

קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all קֹרְאָ֑יו <S%H7121><s%> unto all them that call לְכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who יִקְרָאֻ֣הוּ <S%H7121><s%> upon him to all that call בֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> upon him in truth

רְצוֹן־ <S%H7522><s%> the desire יְרֵאָ֥יו <S%H3373><s%> of them that fear יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> He will fulfil וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁוְעָתָ֥ם <S%H7775><s%> their cry יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> him he also will hear וְיוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <S%H3467><s%> and will save

שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> preserveth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹהֲבָ֑יו <S%H157><s%> all them that love וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> him but all the wicked יַשְׁמִֽיד׃ <S%H8045><s%> will he destroy

תְּהִלַּ֥ת <S%H8416><s%> the praise יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְֽדַבֶּ֫ר־ <S%H1696><s%> shall speak פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> My mouth וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> bless כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בָּ֭שָׂר <S%H1320><s%> and let all flesh שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> his holy לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever
